title: The Biker's Heart
description: "I’ll never forgive you for this. I’ll never, ever, ever forgive you for leaving me with your fucking mess."   The final part of the Cold Steel MC trilogy...  They've managed to win over Samantha's father, but there's a bigger problem now: Boon's father. He violently tears Samantha's family apart, and she has no idea what to do. Boon has a plan though. He's leaving. He's running away to Mexico, and he's never coming back. He simply can't face his own father.  This is the end of Boon and Samantha's story.  Steamy and suspenseful.
author: Meg Jackson
